identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Minecraft blockiness with Ethereal Bioluminescence.
Emotion First: The site must feel like 'discovering a secret cave'.
Content is King: Every scroll triggers a narrative shift (Surface -> Underground).
Negative Space: Don't clutter. Let the background breathe.
Contrast: Neon Cyan against Deep Rock Blue.
anti_patterns: No static backgrounds - everything must feel alive.

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Game names

mono.usage: IP Address, Code snippets, Server stats

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid (Mode A for Games, Mode B for Stats)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(34,211,238,0.3)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-xl font-unbounded
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary hover:bg-secondary/20 border border-secondary/20 backdrop-blur-md rounded-xl font-unbounded
buttons.ip_copy: group relative overflow-hidden bg-black/40 border border-white/10 hover:border-primary/50 transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl p-4 flex items-center gap-4 cursor-pointer

cards.glass: bg-black/20 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 hover:border-white/20 transition-all duration-300 rounded-3xl
cards.game_card: relative h-[400px] w-full overflow-hidden rounded-3xl transition-all duration-500 hover:flex-[2] group

navigation.classes: bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-2xl border border-white/10 rounded-full px-6 py-3 flex items-center gap-8

visual_enhancers.texture: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on all dark backgrounds

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Implement the 'Day/Night' context provider. It must check system time but allow manual toggle.
3. BACKGROUND: Create a 'ParallaxBackground' component. It should have 3 layers. Top layer is the Cherry Blossom Tree. Use Framer Motion 'useScroll' and 'useTransform'.
4. HERO: Center the Logo. Add the 'IP Copy' button below it. The button must have a 'Copied!' animation state.
5. GAMES: Build the 'GameAccordion' component. Vertical slices that expand on hover. Use the placeholder images provided.
6. STATS: Create a 'LiveStats' component. Mock the data (4 players online). Use a 'pulse' animation for the 'Online' indicator.
7. FOOTER: Massive footer with the 'Axecraft' logo in text-9xl opacity-5.
8. CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Plains -> Cave' transition happens smoothly on scroll. Use a gradient overlay that fades in as user scrolls down.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very subtle shine.
Never use 'alert()' or native confirm dialogs.
